text: Eusebio Leal Spengler (11 September 1942 – 31 July 2020) was a Cuban-Mexican historian. He was born in Havana. He was director of the restoration program of Old Havana and its historical center, UNESCO World Heritage Site and was an honorary member of the National Assembly of People's Power. He was a well known historian of the city of Havana. Leal died on 31 July 2020 in Havana from pancreatic cancer, aged 77.Falleció Eusebio Leal este viernes ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Mexican historians Category:People from Havana
title: Eusebio Leal
